items.title: Morgan Stanley is opening cryptocurrency investments to all clients. Here’s what percentage of your portfolio should be in crypto.
items.description: Morgan Stanley will rely on its automated monitoring processes to make sure clients are not overly exposed to crypto.

items.title: ‘I can’t stop thinking about money’: I’m struggling with guilt over my $135K in financial mistakes. How do I move on?
items.description: “We aren’t in debt outside of our mortgage, but I feel sick when I think about the money.”

items.title: My sister is 65. She has $80,000 in bonds and savings, and $2,600 a month in Social Security. Can she retire?
items.description: “She is single and makes $55,000 a year.”
